description: Fluency evaluation tasks for testing surface quality and grammatical correctness

prompts.prompt: Describe a beautiful sunset in 3-4 sentences. Focus on clear, grammatically correct language.
Write a brief story about a person who discovers a mysterious door. Use varied sentence structures and proper grammar.
Explain how a bicycle works in simple terms. Use clear, well-structured sentences.
Write a friendly email to a colleague about a project update. Use natural, conversational language.
Describe a complex machine or process in detail. Use sophisticated vocabulary while maintaining clarity and grammatical correctness.
